abstracts.cdata!:
The Social Protection Administration
            Project aims to improve Armenia's capacity to provide
            more efficient, effective and high quality services to the
            population by the public employment, pension and social
            assistance agencies. The reallocation is necessary to: (a)
            support establishment of additional Integrated Social
            Service Centers in order to have at least 15 centers fully
            functional by the end of the Project, which will require
            investments in the civil works, furniture, IT hardware and
            software; and (b) complete the modernization of the
            'Gorts' information system of the State Employment
            Service and improve the information system of the State
            Labor Inspectorate.
